comments.body: Quote from: Qchatr.io on January 05, 2023, 11:01:57 AMTop Gainers and Losers, ATH/ATL, Advancing/Declining and easy data, tools and indicators for crypto markets.More data: https://qchart.ioA good site for investors and traders and it has a professional, easy and simplified interface that is also compatible with phones. I hope that you will release an application for phones on Google Play and App Store in the future. I hope that you will add a bar to search for any currency through the Qchart site. I also see that crypto new ATH and ATL data is not accurate and there are currencies whose price is $0. I hope you put their prices and percentages accurately. Also, if you put the lighting and darkening feature on the site, it will be better for readers. Just a few suggestions, thank you

comments.body: Quote from: Qchatr.io on January 05, 2023, 11:01:57 AMTop Gainers and Losers, ATH/ATL, Advancing/Declining and easy data, tools and indicators for crypto markets.More data: https://qchart.ioThe idea is somewhat acceptable and the design is very elegant, but it seems that there is a problem. comments.author: Qchatr.io
comments.body: What is QChart?Qchart.io is a new, easy-to-use cryptocurrency tracking tool. It features everything you need in one place: real-time charts, cryptocurrency market cap, and other information from the most popular cryptocurrencies.    The Qchart APP offers real-time cryptocurrency information and charts, helping you follow and predict the market.   We offer real time Qchart for all your crypto needs  Qchart was designed to readably display all relevant information regarding multiple cryptocurrency markets, exchanges and prices. You can switch between Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and other cryptocurrency prices with a single click.
